Installation

  1. Include jQuery - <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.10.2/jquery.min.js"></script> - http://jquery.com/
  2. Include T3 - <script src="/path/to/t3.x.x.x.js"></script>
  3. Create an app.js file and place it at the bottom of your page. Add the following code to it: 
                    Box.Application.init();
